bug.author: Esther2013
bug.summary: array_ops.slice throw exception in Eager mode.
bug.description: array_ops.slice throw exception in Eager mode. Tensorflow.InvalidArgumentError: NodeDef mentions attr 'Index' not in Op<name=Pack; signature=values:N*T -> output:T; attr=N:int,min=1; attr=T:type; attr=axis:int,default=0>; NodeDef: {{node Pack}}. (Check whether your GraphDef-interpreting binary is up to date with your GraphDef-generating binary.).
